TopicTitle: Another .99$ Custom KSP mouse pad? Yes please.

Articles.Content:
A while ago there was this promo code to get a (almost) free mouse pad printed with a custom picture.

Well, i found another one!

To use it you have to register at Artscow.com (keep in mind that you can use one code per IP/account), then go to [this page.](http://www.artscow.com/photo-gifts/mousepad/large-mousepad-160) Click on "CREATE IT!" and then customize your pad.

After that go to checkout insert the coupon code: **Z099MOUSEPADU8N3R**

Pay the bill and it's done!

Of course they are made in China and they can take a while to get delivered but the print quality is not bad (as long as the image is sufficiently hig-res).

I got a KSP Delta-v map pad a while ago (that is now useless because of the new aero) and this time i got something [a bit more universal](http://i.imgur.com/KxUHaU0.jpg).

I'll post pictures of mine as soon as i get it. In the meantime, enjoy!

PS: the pad tends to get dirty really fast if it has a lot of white on it, so be advised.
